articles.description: Dow Jones futures rose while Bitcoin fell. AstraZeneca said it'll likely run a new coronavirus vaccine study. The U.S. began a Tesla suspension probe.
articles.content: Dow Jones futures rose modestly Friday morning, along with S&P 500 futures and Nasdaq futures. AstraZeneca (AZN) said it would likely need to conduct another study for its coronavirus vaccine. Th… [+10902 chars]

articles.title: What do you do with leftover turkey? - The Takeout
